Room.Name: Gates of Castle Rutger
Room.ShortDescription: You are outside the massive gates of Prince Rutger's Castle.
Room.LongDescription: There is a level lot with carts and wagons pulled up and waiting for their owners. A small door, for use after dark, is beside the huge gate. Farther north is an animal keep and stable. On the west side of the wagon lot is a strange device: Looks like a tubular slide to take you to the bottom of the mountain face so you won't have to travel down the road.
